lines.i: The delivery attendant's final estimate of gestation based on all perinatal factors and assessments.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.21"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:330)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:332)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:331)/@code="11884-4" Gestational age Estimated (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:510)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - that it records the birth attendant's estimate of gestation.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:333)
The final estimate of gestation based on all perinatal factors and assessments, but not the neonatal exam. The value is to be provided as a number of completed weeks.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:330)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:332)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:331)/@code="11884-4" Gestational age Estimated (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:510)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - that it records the birth attendant's estimate of gestation.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:333)
The final estimate of gestation based on all perinatal factors and assessments, but not the neonatal exam. The value is to be provided as a number of completed weeks.
